update ${centreTableName}

update ${centreTableName}
table_name = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startdown_time = #{startdownTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
startup_time = #{startupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update ${centreTableName}
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_notes = #{auditNotes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sync_time = #{syncTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_code = concat_ws(',',user_code,#{operCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),
WHERE 1=1
and table_name LIKE concat('%',#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND date_format(startdown_time,'%Y-%m')= #{startdownTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
